alert.note: Alert for El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 22 at 12:05AM MDT until June 22 at 5:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Major severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Colorado... Fountain Creek Near Fountain affecting El Paso County. Fountain Creek Near Pinon affecting Pueblo County. .Heavy rainfall across southern El Paso county will cause flooding of Fountain Creek. For the Fountain Creek...including Colorado Springs, Fountain, Pinon, Pueblo...Moderate to Major flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Fountain Creek Near Fountain. * WHEN...Until late this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flood waters flow over Old Pueblo Road south of Fountain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 PM MDT Wednesday the stage was 9.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 16.1 feet early this morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 am MDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Fri Sat Sun Fountain Creek Fountain 12.0 9.5 Wed 11 pm MD 8.4 8.3 MSG &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 1215 PM MDT.
